comments:
When ran against 3.2.2 the following failure is reported for DefaultBindSupportFactoryBooleanPrimitiveTest.testStringToBooleanPrimitiveConverter.  The issue is that in 3.2.2 Status.setMessage(...) doesn't allow null for the message.  In 3.3 if null is passed on construction it is defaulted to "".  We need to default "" when constructing Statuses if the Exception's message is null.  The line causing this issue is ValueBinding 169 when a NPE is caught.
